nas.description: Shows the status of the NAS device. 0 means it is offline or unreachable, 1 means it is online and functioning.

occupancy.description: Indicates the number of detected occupants in the room, from 0 up to 9.

light_level.description: Represents the ambient light level. Higher values mean brighter environments.

battery_level.description: Represents the battery status. 0 means normal level, 1 means low battery warning.

water_leak.description: Indicates if any water leaks are detected. 0 means no leak, 1 means leak detected.
